PAD_AfterDragon.synopsis: The player reads a sign warning against the Risen Road after having seen the dragon destroy the bridge to the detour.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The AD sessions (AD_Detour, AD_001, and AD_002) all describe a sign that appears before entering the Risen Road detour and seem to be alternative ways (mutually exclusive triggers) of encountering the same event. In other words, in any given playthrough, you will experience only one of these AD sessions. On the other hand, the PAD_AfterDragon session occurs after the dragon destroys the bridge leading to the detour. Thus, it logically follows that whichever AD session is triggered comes before PAD_AfterDragon.
